dialogue.text: ...Who could that be at the lovely hour of....
[TESS]: Hey, can you come over?\nI need to tell you something.....\n(Kinda about what happened yesterday)...
(Guess she changed her mind about not bringing it up...)
[ME]: I gotta make coffee first lol...\nAfter that, I'll be headin' over. :)
(Hope she's not upset at me or anything...)\n(But I guess that I shouldn't overthink about what she needs to say....)
